message.body: It's gonna be cold on Friday. Another possible record setting cold.
Oh wonderful.
Nothing from villanova yet. Imma be real angry if we don't even get s delay.
Lol I'm praying for ya
AHHHHH YOURE THE FREAKING BEST!
"WEATHER CLOSURE - Villanova University & VLS are closed and all day classes are canceled today 2/17/15."
Muahahahaha! Hahaha
I work my magic lol
Haha. Seriously!
So my lab partner and I have to do a lab assignment. She thought I was going to Villanova today, in this snow, to do it. I was like "yeah, I'm not going to campus...we'll email."
Haha she's crazy

I went to go find you a dress. I looked at lulu's which is such a great place, btw. I found a billabong skirt for $49 that I really liked, but they sold out of it. So I looked on the billabong website and it was on sale for only $20 and free shipping!
Well, if you find something somewhere, lemme know cause...it's overwhelming looking at all these. Haha.
You wanna order something when you come home or did you eat already?
We can order something. I didn't eat
What do you want?
Okay. I'll ask Brian if he can wait or not.
You can order now if not.
Oh. HAH! Didn't think of that.
Haha
Where are you gonna order from?
￼How awkward.
I dunno. I guess uncle oogies?
There's a restaurant called pellicane's nest that does sandwiches. Has 4.1 stars out of 5.
Uncle oogies has more though. Sorry.
Lol whicheverx
I guess get me either a Cobb salad with ranch dressing instead of the blue cheese or the buffalo chicken salad. Idk which I want more haha
I'm gonna get you a buffalo chicken salad. I feel like pizza places don't know how to really make a salad, so getting the buffalo might make it a little better.
You want blue cheese with the buffalo?
Yeah that's cool
